situation.remark: Restrictions in effect from March 31 to at least April 30:
situation.quarantaine: Curfew from 8pm till 5am. Stay at home policy
situation.shop: All non essentail shops are closed.
situation.event: Ban on all recreational events, sports, culture and other
situation.travel: Thermal checks at ports of entry. Travellers from China, Korea, Iran, France, United States and Italy need to quarantaine for 14 days.

situation.event: All events and group activities with 100 participants or more are prohibited.
situation.travel: Borders are closed, travellers need to maintain a 14-day self-quarantaine.

situation.quarantaine: Curfew from 10pm till 6am. Stay at home policy. 65+ only outside for medical procedures or between 11am and 1pm or 8pm and 9pm.
situation.event: Ban on all recreational events, sports, culture and other. Gatherings with more than 3 people are banned
situation.travel: Low traffic border controls closed. Traffic to and from Italy prohibited.
situation.note: State of emergency declared on the 18th of March. More info
